title: Apple releases third beta version of tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4 [U]
content:
Update: Public beta testers can now download the third test version of tvOS 15.4. HomePod 15.4 is still limited to selected developers to try.

A week after releasing beta 2 of tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4, Apple is now seeding the third beta of these operating systems to developers.

more…

The post Apple releases third beta version of tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4 [U] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A week after releasing beta 2 of tvOS 15.4 and HomePod 15.4, Apple is now seeding the third beta of these operating systems to developers.
